title: conferred on me by section 1(2) of the Gambling Regulation Act 2024 (No. 35
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Gambling Regulation Act 2024
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Gambling Regulation Act 2024 

(Commencement) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited gambling regulation act 2024 (commencement) order 2025

title: conferred on me by section 1(2) of the Gambling Regulation Act 2024 (No. 35
heading: 2. The 5th day of March is appointed as the day on which the following
text_raw:
2. The 5th day of March is appointed as the day on which the following 
provisions of the Gambling Regulation Act 2024 (No. 35 of 2024) shall come 
into operation: 

(a) Part 1, other than sections 6 and 10; 

(b) Chapter 1 of Part 2, other than paragraphs (a) to (l) of section 

15(1); 

(c) Chapter 2 of Part 2, other than – 

(i) 

subsections (2) to (6) of section 40, 

(ii) 

section 41, and 

(iii) section 42; 

(d) Part 3; 

(e) Chapter 3 of Part 4, other than section 81. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

28 February, 2025. 

JIM O’CALLAGHAN, 
Minister for Justice. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 7th March, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [57] 3
